text: Pure Hearts () is a 2017 Italian drama film directed by Roberto De Paolis. It was screened in the Directors' Fortnight section at the 2017 Cannes Film Festival. ==Cast== * Selene Caramazza as Agnese * Simone Liberati as Stefano * Barbora Bobulova as Marta * Stefano Fresi as Don Luca * Edoardo Pesce as Lele * Antonella Attili as Angela * Isabella Delle Monache as Beatrice ==References== ==External links== * Category:2017 films Category:2017 drama films Category:Italian films Category:Italian drama films Category:Italian- language films Category:2017 directorial debut films
title: Pure Hearts
